weekly_top_story.headline: Venezuelan Opposition Leader Maria Corina Machado Wins Nobel Peace Prize
weekly_top_story.summary: Maria Corina Machado has been awarded the Nobel Peace Prize for her efforts in promoting democracy and peaceful political transition in Venezuela, marking a significant moment in international recognition of her work.

stories.headline: Israel Pulls Back Troops as Gaza Ceasefire Takes Effect
stories.summary: A ceasefire between Israel and Hamas has been instituted, potentially reshaping regional dynamics and restoring hostages, with Ehud Barak attributing the success of the deal to Trump's diplomacy efforts.

stories.headline: China Intensifies Semiconductor Inspections, Restricting Nvidia Imports
stories.summary: China has increased inspections on semiconductor shipments, particularly restricting Nvidia chip imports, in an effort to reduce dependence on US technology and promote domestic tech development.
stories.source: Leverage Edu and Unspecified News Source

stories.headline: North Korea Displays New Long-Range Missile at Military Parade
stories.summary: North Korea showcased a new long-range missile during a military parade, escalating regional tensions and raising concerns among international observers.
